00028 #include "PeakDetector.hpp"

00030 #include <memory>
00031 #include <complex>

00033 
00034 namespace pwiz {
00035 namespace peaks {
00036 
00037 
00038 /// MatchedFilter implementation of the PeakDetector interface. 
00039 
00040 class PeakDetectorMatchedFilter : public PeakDetector
00041 {
00042     public:
00043 
00044     /// structure for holding configuration
00045     struct Config
00046     {
00047         /// IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator pointer, must be valid for PeakDetector lifetime 
00048         const proteome::IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator* isotopeEnvelopeEstimator;
00049 
00050         /// number of filter correlations computed per frequency step 
00051         int filterMatchRate;
00052 
00053         /// number of filter samples taken on either side of 0
00054         int filterSampleRadius;
00055 
00056         /// noise floor multiple for initial peak reporting threshold 
00057         double peakThresholdFactor;
00058 
00059         /// maximum correlation angle (degrees) for initial peak reporting 
00060         double peakMaxCorrelationAngle;
00061 
00062         /// noise floor multiple for isotope filter threshold 
00063         double isotopeThresholdFactor;
00064 
00065         /// noise floor multiple for monoisotopic peak threshold 
00066         double monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor;
00067 
00068         /// isotope filter maximum charge state to score
00069         int isotopeMaxChargeState;
00070 
00071         /// isotope filter maximum number of neutrons to score
00072         int isotopeMaxNeutronCount; 
00073 
00074         /// multiple peaks within this radius (Hz) are reported as single peak
00075         double collapseRadius; 
00076 
00077         /// use the magnitude of the peak shape filter kernel for finding peaks 
00078         bool useMagnitudeFilter;
00079 
00080         /// log detail level (0 == normal, 1 == extra)
00081         int logDetailLevel; 
00082 
00083         /// log stream (0 == no logging)
00084         std::ostream*  log;
00085 
00086         Config()
00087         :   isotopeEnvelopeEstimator(0),
00088             filterMatchRate(0),
00089             filterSampleRadius(0),
00090             peakThresholdFactor(0), 
00091             peakMaxCorrelationAngle(0),
00092             isotopeThresholdFactor(0),
00093             monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor(0),
00094             isotopeMaxChargeState(0),
00095             isotopeMaxNeutronCount(0),
00096             collapseRadius(0),
00097             useMagnitudeFilter(false),
00098             logDetailLevel(0),
00099             log(0)
00100         {}
00101     };
00102 
00103 
00104     /// \name Instantiation 
00105     //@{
00106 
00107     /// create an instance.
00108     static std::auto_ptr<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter> create(const Config& config);
00109 
00110     virtual ~PeakDetectorMatchedFilter(){}
00111     //@}
00112 
00113 
00114     /// \name PeakDetector interface
00115     //@{
00116     virtual void findPeaks(const pwiz::data::FrequencyData& fd, 
00117                            pwiz::data::peakdata::Scan& result) const = 0; 
00118     //@}
00119 
00120 
00121     /// \name PeakDetectorMatchedFilter interface
00122     //@{
00123 
00124     /// access to the configuration
00125     virtual const Config& config() const = 0;
00126 
00127     /// structure for holding the matched filter calculation results
00128     struct Score
00129     {
00130         double frequency;
00131         int charge;
00132         int neutronCount;
00133         double value;
00134 
00135         double monoisotopicFrequency;
00136         std::complex<double> monoisotopicIntensity;
00137         int peakCount;
00138 
00139         std::vector<pwiz::data::peakdata::Peak> peaks;
00140 
00141         Score(double _f = 0, int _c = 0, int _n = 0)
00142         :   frequency(_f), charge(_c), neutronCount(_n),
00143             value(0), monoisotopicFrequency(0), monoisotopicIntensity(0),
00144             peakCount(0)
00145         {}
00146     };
00147 
00148     /// same as PeakDetector::findPeaks(), but provides additional Score information
00149     virtual void findPeaks(const pwiz::data::FrequencyData& fd, 
00150                            pwiz::data::peakdata::Scan& result,
00151                            std::vector<Score>& scores) const = 0; 
00152 
00153     //@}
00154 };
